scripts.build:local: npm run check:runtime && npm run prebuild && next build --no-lint
scripts.build:ci: DOCTOR_STRICT=1 npm run doctor && npm run prebuild && next build
scripts.build:debug: mkdir -p logs && npm run check:runtime && npm run prebuild && NEXT_TELEMETRY_DISABLED=1 next build --debug 2>&1 | tee logs/build-debug.log
scripts.check:all: npm run check:runtime && npm run check:types && npm run check:content && npm run check:lint
scripts.cf:build: npm run check:runtime && npm run prebuild && npx @cloudflare/next-on-pages@1 && node scripts/prepare-wrangler-assets.mjs
scripts.cf:deploy: npm run cf:build && npx wrangler deploy
scripts.cf:noop: echo "Cloudflare Pages deploy handled by platform"
